comments:
Build 2004-06-07:2000

Occasionally, I get authentication failures when synchronizing with
dev.eclipse.org. Subsequent synchronizations on the exact same workspace work
without problems (witnout entering the password again, so that's not the
problem). Just for kicks, here's the stack trace:

org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.connection.CVSAuthenticationException:
Authentication error: com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException: Auth fail
